title: Universal Units
subtitle: Brand and company website redesign
excerpt: Universal Units logo redesign, brand unification, and company website design.

description.text: At my work in Universal Units one of my responsibilities is the company image. With this in mind, during the last months of 2014 and the first half of 2015, I worked on a redesign of the company logo with the aim to fix the readability and visibility problems of the previous one as well as to define and unify the brand image.
This logo redesig was then accompanied by a complete redesign of the company website, as well as other sales and marketing material.
